byline.contributor: Mohamed Ibrahim contributed reporting from Mogadishu, Somalia.

abstract: Shabab militant group vows to retaliate after Kenyan military sent hundreds of soldiers into Somalia.
snippet: The Kenyan military sent hundreds of soldiers into Somalia over the weekend, and the Shabab militant group vowed to attack Kenya in retaliation.
lead_paragraph: The Kenyan military sent hundreds of soldiers into Somalia over the weekend, and the Shabab militant group vowed to attack Kenya in retaliation.

headline.main: Somali Militants Threaten Kenya Over Cross-Border Troops
headline.print_headline: Somali Militants Threaten Kenya Over Cross-Border Troops
headline.seo: Somali Militants Vow to Attack Kenya
